Reference range: 150,000-400,000/mm3 \n
\n
Common Symptoms - \n
1.Easy or excessive bruising \n
2.Bleeding from your gums or nose \n
3.Blood in urine or stools \n
4.Unusually heavy menstrual flows \n
5.Fatigue \n
\n
Treatment- \n
*Consent to a Doctor \n
1.Vitamin B-12: clams,eggs \n
2.Folate: peanuts,black-eyed peas,kidney beans,orange juice \n
3.Iron: pumpkin seeds,lentils \n
4.Vitamin C: pineapple, tomatoes, cauliflower \n
